hero.title: Become an Industry-Ready Developer
hero.description: Join our intensive tech bootcamp designed to transform aspiring developers into industry professionals. 8-week intensive program with hands-on projects and mentorship.

programDetails.title: Program Details
programDetails.durationDesc: Full-time commitment with flexible evening options
programDetails.capacityDesc: Max 25 students per cohort for personalized attention
programDetails.prerequisitesDesc: Basic programming knowledge or completion of pre-course

locations.title: Available Locations
locations.subtitle: Start your journey in your city

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our graduates
testimonials.testimonial1: WeCode changed my life. I went from zero coding knowledge to landing a job at a top tech company in just 3 months after graduation.
testimonials.testimonial2: The mentorship and hands-on projects gave me the confidence I needed. The network I built is invaluable for my career.
testimonials.testimonial3: This program is worth every peso. The instructors are passionate, the curriculum is modern, and the job placement rate speaks for itself.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
faq.q1: Do I need prior coding experience?
faq.a1: No, but basic problem-solving skills are helpful. We offer a free pre-course for beginners.
faq.a2: Full-time: Monday-Friday, 9am-5pm. Evening options available on request.
faq.a3: Yes, we offer flexible payment plans and partnerships with fintech companies.
faq.q4: What is the job placement rate?
faq.a4: Our graduates have a 92% job placement rate within 3 months of graduation.
faq.a5: Yes, our certificate is recognized by major tech companies across Africa.
faq.q6: Can I do the program part-time?
faq.a6: We're piloting part-time cohorts. Contact us for more information.
